description:
Approach

It is the same approach as for Alma. The drop in is marked by a white pic pipe on the right side of the trail. The ravine is a bushwhack drainage at first. We found no anchor at the first drop, so we used a fiddlestick and a small tree 30 feet back from the top of the rappel.

Descent

After the first drop, the canyon is well bolted. We found 23 anchors. There may also have be a few small jumps at the end of the canyon.

Exit

The river crosses a dam/road where you will exit left up to where you parked your car.

Red tape

Beta sites

  • An Kanion La-madinina  : Bras Exbrayat
  • Mur d'Eau Caraibe  : Rivière massé - bras Exbrayat
  • An Kanion La-madinina  : Rivière Massé [PC-20]
  • An Kanion La-madinina  : Rivière Massé; Bras Exbrayat [PC-19]

Trip reports and media

Background
name: Exbrayat
